name: Shitzophrenia
description:
A 3D fnaf-style horror game about a man with schitzophrenia, trying to take a shit, but he forgot his pills. Disclaimer the content of this game could be considered offensive; viewer discretion is advised. 

Excuse the assets' quality, our 3d modeler got sick around the same time development started. Will be updated in the future to have better visuals and added sounds. Textures used with proper licenses from https://polyhaven.com/ and https://3dtextures.me/.

TEAM:

BananaFace301- coding, music, design

Goldie- art, models, design
